metadata.title: CVE-2023-39197 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in Netfilter ConnectionTracking (conntrack) in the Linux kernel. This flaw allows a remote user todisclose sensitive information via the DCCP protocol.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
